烻字的基本解释

烻
yàn
光强烈。

烻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《集韻》延面切，去綫，以。］
光盛貌。
[②]［shān］
［《集韻》尸連切，平，書。］
光闪动貌。

烻字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烻； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页671第30
【集韻】尸連切，音羶。光也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?抽延切，音鏈。義同。　又延面切，音衍光熾也。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】丹柱歙赩而電烻。【註】烻光盛起也。弋戰切。

考證：〔【王延壽魯靈光殿賦】丹桂歙赩而電烻。〕　謹照原文丹桂改丹柱。
烻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
烻字的起名意思

指光强烈。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烻; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 671 30
[Jiyun] The corpse is cut continuously, and the sound is mutton. Light also.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Extend and cut, sound chain. The same meaning.　The noodles are cut again, and the sound is light. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】Dan Zhu was old and electric. [Note] Fengguang Shengqi also. Yi Zhan cut. Textual research: [[Wang Yanshou Lu Lingguang Palace Fu] Dan Guishe was stubborn and electric. 〕　I would like to change the Dan Zhu according to the original Dangui.
